verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou hast <S%H2713>searched<s%> me, and <S%H3045>known<s%> me.
Thou <S%H859><s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> my <S%H3427>downsitting<s%> and mine <S%H6965>uprising,<s%> thou <S%H995>understandest<s%> my <S%H7454>thought<s%> afar <S%H4480>off.<s%> <S%H7350><s%>
Thou <S%H2219>compassest<s%> my <S%H734>path<s%> and my lying <S%H7252>down,<s%> and art <S%H5532>acquainted<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H4405>word<s%> in my <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> but, <S%H2005>lo,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> it <S%H3605>altogether.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H6696>beset<s%> me <S%H268>behind<s%> and <S%H6924>before,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> thine <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me.
Such <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is too <S%H6383>wonderful<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> me; it is <S%H7682>high,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> attain unto it.
Whither <S%H575><s%> shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> from thy <S%H4480>spirit?<s%> <S%H7307><s%> or <S%H575>whither<s%> shall I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from thy <S%H4480>presence?<s%> <S%H6440><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I ascend <S%H5266>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H8033>there:<s%> if I make my <S%H3331>bed<s%> in <S%H7585>hell,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thou art there.
If I <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning,<s%> and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the uttermost <S%H319>parts<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>
Even <S%H1571><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me, and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H270>hold<s%> me.
If I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H7779>cover<s%> me; even the <S%H3915>night<s%> shall be <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H1157>about<s%> me.

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H2821>hideth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee; but the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H215>shineth<s%> as the <S%H3117>day:<s%> the <S%H2825>darkness<s%> and the <S%H219>light<s%> are both alike to thee.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H7069>possessed<s%> my <S%H3629>reins:<s%> thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> me in my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>womb.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee; <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3588><s%> I am <S%H3372>fearfully<s%> and <S%H6395>wonderfully<s%> made: <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> are thy <S%H4639>works;<s%> and that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> right <S%H3966>well.<s%>

My <S%H6108>substance<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>hid<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, <S%H834>when<s%> I was <S%H6213>made<s%> in <S%H5643>secret,<s%> and curiously <S%H7551>wrought<s%> in the lowest <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> my substance, yet being <S%H1564>unperfect;<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> thy <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my members were <S%H3789>written,<s%> which in <S%H3117>continuance<s%> were <S%H3335>fashioned,<s%> when as yet there was <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H259><s%> of them.
How <S%H4100><s%> <S%H3365>precious<s%> also are thy <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> unto me, O <S%H410>God!<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H6105>great<s%> is the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of them!
If I should <S%H5608>count<s%> them, they are more in <S%H7235>number<s%> than the <S%H4480>sand:<s%> <S%H2344><s%> when I <S%H6974>awake,<s%> I am <S%H5750>still<s%> with <S%H5973>thee.<s%>
Surely <S%H518><s%> thou wilt <S%H6991>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> O <S%H433>God:<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me therefore, ye <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>
For <S%H834><s%> they <S%H559>speak<s%> against thee <S%H4209>wickedly,<s%> and thine <S%H6145>enemies<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> thy name in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Do <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee? and am not I <S%H6962>grieved<s%> with those that rise up <S%H8618>against<s%> thee?
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them with <S%H8503>perfect<s%> <S%H8135>hatred:<s%> I <S%H1961>count<s%> them mine <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
Search <S%H2713><s%> me, O <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3824>heart:<s%> <S%H974>try<s%> me, and <S%H3045>know<s%> my thoughts: <S%H8312><s%>
And <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there be any <S%H6090>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in me, and <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
